rooms.description: A spacious and modern entrance with a reception desk, art deco motifs, and ambient lighting. Designed to comply with Vastu by aligning the main entrance to the north-east corner for positive energy flow.

An open-concept living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows along the south-west facade to maximize natural light while respecting local architectural norms and Vastu principles. Incorporates art deco details in furniture and wall finishes.
An integrated dining space adjacent to the living area, with ample seating and decorative motifs aligning with art deco style. Windows are placed on the east side per Vastu guidelines for prosperity.

A flexible studio that can serve as a home office or creative space, incorporating high ceilings and art deco accents. The room's layout is designed to optimize energy flow in accordance with Vastu principles.

openings.description: The primary entrance door located at the north-east corner, ensuring positive ingress as per Vastu. It is designed to be visually appealing with art deco finishes and features floor-to-ceiling glass panels.

A series of large, floor-to-ceiling windows lining the south-west facade for unobstructed natural light while ensuring privacy and energy efficiency. Designed to blend modern aesthetics with traditional art deco elements.

rooms.description: A luxurious master bedroom suite featuring a private balcony, built-in wardrobes, and art deco design elements. Windows are positioned on the south-east side per Vastu guidelines for personal growth and positivity.
Two well-appointed guest bedrooms with integrated dressing areas and modern lighting. Their positioning adheres to Vastu by placing them in the north-west quadrant of the layout.

Modern bathrooms for each bedroom, designed with art deco fixtures and floor-to-ceiling glass partitions where appropriate for an airy feel, while ensuring privacy. Vastu alignment is maintained by orienting water features to the north-east.

openings.description: Exterior openings leading from the master bedroom suite to a private balcony, designed for natural ventilation and aesthetic appeal following art deco design principles.

rooms.description: An open, multifunctional studio space that can be used as a living area or creative workspace. Its design incorporates art deco elements in its fixtures and finishes while aligning with Vastu by positioning it in the favourable east quadrant.
A dedicated outdoor space for relaxation, positioned at the front of the townhouse. This area is designed to complement the interior aesthetics and offers views over the swimming pool below.

openings.description: A large skylight integrated into the studio apartment's ceiling, ensuring ample natural lighting while aligning with Vastu guidelines for energy flow. The design is modern and in harmony with art deco styling.

rooms.description: A luxurious swimming pool situated on the sub-ground level. The pool area features surrounding deck space, ambient lighting, and a sound system for entertainment, while respecting Vastu by orienting water elements towards the north-east.
